sections.content:
Question:
According to the following document (application note for the RZ/A1H-group product), the target device of the PCDC driver is the RZ/A1H-group product. Can the PCDC driver be used for an RZ/A1L product?
https://www.renesas.com/document/apn/rza1h-group-usb-peripheral-communications-device-class-driver-pcdc
Answer:
Yes, the driver can be used because their USB modules are the same.
Suitable Products
RZ/A1L
